name: Hermit the Crab
description:
( most of ) my art is based on my life and ( how circumstances affect our ) thoughts and feelings. 

This particular piece refers to my ( former ) hermit like life, in a mountain village in Portugal, further increased by the energy and effects of Covid19. 

It also talks about introvertedness:

"Even though he loved to talk,
Hermit the crab was often alone. 
On the top of the mountain, inside his shell."


I created this work, 10 months ago. These days I am renting a house in another area, with more likeminded people around me. I am also in the process of selling my hermit house ( getting close ).  

A little more info on this piece ( that I previously tried to sell on Hive's NFT Showroom ), can be found here:

https://peakd.com/@vincentnijman/hermit-the-crab-whether-living-alone-is-loneliness-or-freedom-is-a-matter-of-perspective
